import numpy as np # linear algebra
import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
import plotly.graph_objs as go
import plotly.offline as py
import plotly.express as px

# Input data files are available in the "../input/" directory.
# For example, running this (by clicking run or pressing Shift+Enter) will list all files under the input directory

import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

source.966682dc:
#code from Meenakshi https://www.kaggle.com/meenakshiramaswamy/covid-wk4-multiple-data-sources-xgboost
isol = df.groupby('dt_notific')['hospitalizações', 'óbitos', 'uti'].sum().reset_index()
isol = isol.melt(id_vars="dt_notific", value_vars=['hospitalizações', 'óbitos', 'uti'],
                 var_name='case', value_name='count')

fig = px.area(isol, x="dt_notific", y="count", color='case',
             title='Confinement in Rio de Janeiro', color_discrete_sequence = ['cyan', 'red', 'orange'])
fig.show()
source.1459f45a:
fig = px.pie(df, values='objectid', names='bairro')
fig.update_traces(textposition='inside')
fig.update_layout(uniformtext_minsize=12, uniformtext_mode='hide')
fig.show()
source.11a9a7e8:
fig = px.pie(df, values='ObjectId2', names='idade')
fig.update_traces(textposition='inside',textfont_size=14)
fig.update_layout(uniformtext_minsize=12, uniformtext_mode='hide')
fig.show()
source.56ba4ee3:
#word cloud
from wordcloud import WordCloud, ImageColorGenerator
text = " ".join(str(each) for each in df.bairro)
# Create and generate a word cloud image:
wordcloud = WordCloud(max_words=200,colormap='Set3', background_color="black").generate(text)
plt.figure(figsize=(10,6))
plt.figure(figsize=(15,10))
# Display the generated image:
plt.imshow(wordcloud, interpolation='Bilinear')
plt.axis("off")
plt.figure(1,figsize=(12, 12))
plt.show()

source.c1b968d0:
Instead of films and series, give preference to documentaries about snake charmers and taming beasts. They will be much more useful.

In other people's bullshit, keep a face of the landscape. Do it like a teenager at Sunday lunch: talk little and listen even less.

Elegance is a subjective concept and nudity has its charm, but certain clothes belong to the bottom of the closet and shouldn't come out of there. Remember that dignity is fleeting and respect the fact that your family - and the delivery boy - do not have the capacity to unravel.

source.72cd5bc7:
#Failure is part of everyday life, even more confined: 

You will try to make a sophisticated dish, you will miss it miserably and will end up eating noodles. Likewise, it will try to entertain the children with playful activities and reading of classics, but it will end up tiring and will hand the kids over to the evil of that evil duo, Playstation and Xbox. Conform.

#When quarantine is over, do as the computer technician does: reset, format the hard drive and reinstall the system. Remember: what happens in confinement is confined.

source.6f179bef:
#Guide to happy confinement, by Leo Aversa

When the quarantine is over, do as the computer technician does: reset, format the HD and reinstall the system


How much has passed? Three weeks? Two years? A century? After so much isolation, the situation in homes is no longer a rose garden: the mighty sound of birds singing outside begins to be muffled by the gnashing of teeth inside, and the sweet and gentle “my love, let's prepare a special dinner ”Is already being replaced by the passive-aggressive“ whatever, be damned 

To avoid chaos, a human relations expert, offer the reader a selection of the most advanced self-help and mind-control tips, the psychological chloroquine that will solve the impending domestic catastrophe

https://translate.google.com.br/translate?hl=en&sl=pt&u=https://oglobo.globo.com/cultura/guia-para-um-confinamento-feliz-24369532&prev=search
source.2b85eaff:
#Never, ever, under any circumstances, enter a DR (discuss the relationship) during confinement. 

For those who don't know, DR is "discussing the relationship", that moment when couples decide to put their relationship on plates - which will be thrown towards each other - cleaned up. Don't make such a mistake, it can be fatal.

Household chores must be divided. No, pressing the button on the washing machine is not the same as sweeping the house, and calling disk-pizza is not the same as preparing lunch. Leave your trickery for another time.

https://translate.google.com.br/translate?hl=en&sl=pt&u=https://oglobo.globo.com/cultura/guia-para-um-confinamento-feliz-24369532&prev=search
source.cf98f296:
#Agree with everything: "yes, sir" or "yes, ma'am"

Should always be your standard answer, said in a way that does not seem like sarcastic superiority or ironic subservience.

Forget - while you're confined - irony and sarcasm. They are figures that only survive in free and airy environments. Sincerity should be used sparingly. In feedlots the three are as dangerous as a spark in a powder deposit.

https://translate.google.com.br/translate?hl=en&sl=pt&u=https://oglobo.globo.com/cultura/guia-para-um-confinamento-feliz-24369532&prev=search
source.908ac54b:
#Lack of communication is a problem, but the excess is much worse. Always remember that. Not only during the pandemic.

Avoid policy comments, even rational and thoughtful ones. Under pressure, some people start to believe very strange things. Don't fall into that trap. Who likes confusion and finger in the face is a therapist and a fan of BBB (Big Brother Brazil).

Do not give in to the voices in your head, let alone body noises.
